solution_line_template: From Monday to Thursday, the cobbler can mend {pairs_per_hour} x {hours_per_day} = <<{pairs_per_hour}*{hours_per_day}={mon_thu_daily}>>{mon_thu_daily} pairs of shoes a day.
From Monday to Thursday, he can mend {mon_thu_daily} x {mon_thu_days} = <<{mon_thu_daily}*{mon_thu_days}={mon_thu_total}>>{mon_thu_total} pairs of shoes.
On Friday, he works for {friday_end} - {friday_start} = <<{friday_end}-{friday_start}={friday_hours}>>{friday_hours} hours.
On Friday, he can mend {pairs_per_hour} x {friday_hours} = <<{pairs_per_hour}*{friday_hours}={friday_total}>>{friday_total} pairs of shoes.
In a week, he can mend {mon_thu_total} + {friday_total} = <<{mon_thu_total}+{friday_total}={total_week}>>{total_week} pairs of shoes.
